name: Physox
description:
Physox is a short 2D puzzle-platformer in which you guide a fox through several levels, with an emphasis on moving objects to reach new destinations. There are 17 levels in total; can you clear them all?

The game should take around 10-20 minutes to complete. Data does not save between runtimes; the game is designed to be fully playable during a single play session.

This is the first solo game I've ever made from scratch. If you decide to play it, any feedback is greatly appreciated. Thank you for checking out this game!

Controls
  • Move left using A or the left arrow key, or right using D or the right arrow key.
  • Jump using the W, up arrow, or Space keys.
  • Press Escape to quit the game.
Game Specifications
  • File Size (Unzipped): 230MB
  • Download Type: Windows x86
  • Game Resolution: Full HD (1920 x 1080)
